title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.38 - Executive Order No. 38: Amending the Executive Orders of December 17, 1968 [No. 31] and February 23, 1970 [No. 35], relating to the creation of the Crime Control Planning Board and Office of Crime Control Planning. [*]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.38 - Executive Order No. 38: Amending the Executive Orders of December 17, 1968 [No. 31] and February 23, 1970 [No. 35], relating to the creation of the Crime Control Planning Board and Office of Crime Control Planning. [*]
State Regulations
I, Nelson A. Rockefeller, Governor of the State of New

York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and the Laws
of the State of New York, do hereby direct by Executive Order that the second
paragraph of the Executive Order of December 17, 1968, establishing the Crime

Control Planning Board and Office of Crime Control Planning, as amended by the

Executive Order of February 23, 1970, be further amended to read as
follows: The Crime Control Planning Board shall consist of
twenty-eight members broadly representative of State and local crime and
juvenile delinquency prevention and control agencies, units of general local
government, and community or citizen interests, to be appointed by, and serve
at the pleasure of, the Governor, who shall also designate one of them as
chairman. The Directors of the Office of Planning Coordination and the Division
of the Budget shall serve as non-voting members. Signed: Nelson A. Rockefeller

Dated: June 10, 1970

Footnotes
*
[Amends Executive Order Nos. 31 and 35, supra. ]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1.38

Amends Executive Order

Nos. 31 and 35, supra. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
